Novr 6" 3
Dr R. C. Hewitt
Chariman Med Board
Louisville. Ky.
Sir,

Your Board will examine Dr. Benjamin Letcher touching his qualifications for the place of Asst Surgeon, he having presented the necessary evidence of his loyalty and good moral character to the Governor

Yours respy
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
By Chas Haydon
Clerk
